articles.content: NASA has carried out several missions to asteroids in space to date, but perhaps its DART Test might be the most important of them. It was the space agency's first planetary defense test which it car… [+2766 chars]

articles.title: “A Planet Within a Planet” – Seismologists Peer Into Earth's Inner Core - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers from the University of Utah have discovered that Earth's inner core is not a homogenous mass but a complex tapestry of different fabrics. The findings, published in Nature, come from seismic data from earthquakes and CTBTO's sensing instruments. T…
articles.content: A team of researchers has discovered that Earths inner core is not a homogenous mass but rather an intricate tapestry of varying fabrics. This research provides new insights into the Earths formation… [+7750 chars]
